how_it_works.title: How LazyNests Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Our AI-powered system handles everything from search to booking, giving you the advantage in competitive housing markets.
how_it_works.step1.title: Smart Crawling
how_it_works.step1.description: Our AI continuously monitors for new listings that match your criteria, 24/7.
how_it_works.step2.title: Intelligent Filtering
how_it_works.step2.description: Advanced algorithms qualify properties based on your preferences, budget, and requirements.
how_it_works.step3.title: Instant Qualification
how_it_works.step3.description: Get only the best matches. No time wasted on unsuitable properties.
how_it_works.step4.title: Quick Booking
how_it_works.step4.description: Be the first to book viewings. Speed gives you the competitive edge in hot markets.
how_it_works.edge.title: Being first increases your chances by up to 300%
how_it_works.edge.description: In competitive markets, the first viewer often gets the house. Let LazyNests give you that edge.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We've got answers. Here are some of the most common things we get asked.
faq.a1: Our AI-powered system continuously scans the largest real estate platform in the Netherlands for new listings that match your specific criteria. It works 24/7 so you never miss an opportunity.
faq.a2: LazyNest goes beyond simple keyword matching. Our AI analyzes property details, descriptions, and even photos to qualify listings based on your nuanced preferences, ensuring you only see the most relevant homes.
faq.a3: Once a perfect match is found and qualified, our system can initiate the viewing request process with the real estate agent on your behalf. This speed is crucial in a competitive market, putting you first in line.
faq.a4: LazyNest offers a free trial to help you get started. After the trial, we have several subscription plans based on the intensity of your search and the number of features you need. This allows us to provide a high-quality, ad-free service.
faq.q5: What gives me a competitive edge?
faq.a5: Speed and precision. By automating the search and qualification process, LazyNest gets you in the door faster than anyone else. In markets where properties are sold within days, being the first to view and make an offer can make all the difference.
